addonCore.label: IGES Toolbox
addonCore.summary: Toolbox for working with IGES CAD-models in Matlab
addonCore.description:
The Matlab function "iges2matlab" extracts parameter data in an IGES file into Matlab. Other functions in the toolbox do plots, transformations, projections etc. All users must first compile the C-source code. This is done in Matlab by running makeIGESmex
and the mex-functions are compiled.
Other Requirements
Some C-compiler must be installed.
